using namespace std;

inline int input()
{
       char c=getchar_unlocked();
       int n=0;
       while(c<'0' || c>'9') c=getchar_unlocked();
       while(c>='0' && c<='9') n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0',c=getchar_unlocked();
       return n;
} 

int main()
{
    list <int> numlist;
    list <int>::iterator it,it2,it3,it4;
    int nCase;
    //scanf("%d",&nCase);
    nCase=input();
    while(nCase--)
    {
       int num;
       //scanf("%d",&num);
       num=input();
       int d=1;
       while(d<=num) d=d<<1;
       int res=2*num+1-d;
       printf("%d\n",res);
    }   
    
    //system("pause");
    return 0;  
}
